ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT(bypass_last_claim_validation__c), Text(Activity_Status__c) != 'New', Text(Activity_Status__c) != 'Cancelled', ISCHANGED(Activity_Status__c), ( OR( $Profile.Name = 'PRM Partner Community User Login', $Profile.Name = 'PRM Partner Relationship Manager Login' ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You are not allowed to select status other than "New" and "Cancelled"
